name: Archena Thermal Complex
address: Carretera del Balneario, s/n, 30600 Archena, Murcia, Spain
description: The Archena Thermal Complex is a modern facility that combines traditional hydrotherapy treatments with the latest technology. It has a wide range of thermal pools, saunas, and relaxation areas, as well as a variety of treatments for wellness and beauty. The water is of volcanic origin and has therapeutic properties for skin, respiratory, and rheumatic problems.
setting: The Archena Thermal Complex is situated in a picturesque valley surrounded by mountains and natural parks. The complex is set in a lush garden with palm trees, flowers, and waterfalls, creating a relaxing and peaceful environment for visitors to enjoy.
